comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
The game was played at the Polo Grounds in New York City, on November 15, 1913. The Indians won, 35-10. There are six Bain/LOC photos of the game posted on Flickr. Here's another one of them:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4545372717/]
